[introduction to the game]

Flower girl is a magic theme elimination game. You will play the role of a spiritual master with a mission. In order to save your beloved, you will set foot on the way to the legendary flower demon country. On the way, you will encounter all kinds of flower demons. Whether to destroy or capture is between your thoughts.

[game features]

◆ more than 80 exquisite CG pictures are waiting for you to collect!!

◆ emotional interpretation of many Japanese voice excellent little sisters!!
◆ full screen experience with UWB fish screen resolution!!
◆ new launch elimination play, feel the charm of jet warrior!!
◆ live2d animation is upgraded again! Rag system! Let's fight happily!!
◆ the game adopts the liking gentleman system to improve liking through multi line plot:)
Please enjoy the gentleman's life in the flower girl world!!!
